content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://dlsspul1234.dfs.core.windows.net/fsspul1234/silver/databases/SalesPurchaseDB/Sales.Customers.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [c]
JOIN
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://dlsspul1234.dfs.core.windows.net/fsspul1234/silver/databases/SalesPurchaseDB/Sales.CustomerCategories.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [cat]
ON c.CustomerCategoryID = cat.CustomerCategoryId
